law.text:
As used in this section and KRS 211.395:
"Department" means the Department for Public Health;
"Eligible medical condition" means Crohn's disease, ulcerative colitis, irritable bowel syndrome or other inflammatory bowel disease, or any other medical condition that requires immediate access to a toilet facility; and
"Person" means an individual who is lawfully on the premises of a public or semipublic building regulated by KRS 211.180.
law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 23, sec. 1, effective July 15, 2008.
